sentences.english: Huagu Opera Art is a product of agricultural civilization.
sentences.chinese: 花鼓燈藝術是農耕文明的產物。

sentences.english: fishing and subsistence farming, by contrast, are reminders of a backward past.
sentences.chinese: 而農耕捕魚則讓人想起落後的過去。

sentences.english: The expansion of agricultural land is destroying tigers’ habitats and food supply.
sentences.chinese: 農耕用地不斷擴大，破壞了老虎的棲息地和食物來源。

sentences.english: Secondly, they devised the narrow-strip, three-field farming system which continued to the 18th century.
sentences.chinese: 其次，他們設計的窄條三圃田農耕制延用至18世紀。

sentences.english: Shuangshizhen had the lowest values of diversity and evenness.
sentences.chinese: 雙石鎮農耕區的多樣性和均勻度指數較低。

sentences.english: The population continues to be heavily rural and dependent on farming for its livelihood.
sentences.chinese: 人口嚴重農村化，生存手段主要依賴於農耕。

sentences.english: Throughout history, many agrarian cultures have celebrated end-of-harvest festivals.
sentences.chinese: 回顧歷史，許多農耕文化都有慶祝豐收節的傳統。

sentences.english: Based on Alanruo, these full-moon festivals are related to the productive cycles in agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 凡是月圓型的節日，大致都與農耕生產週期有關。

sentences.english: Based on Alanruo, these full-moon festivals are about the productive cycles in agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 凡是月圓型的節日，大致都與農耕生產週期有關。

sentences.english: The Culture of Chinese Agriculture Culture;
sentences.chinese: 這成爲農耕文化型舞蹈的又一特徵。

sentences.english: After farming settled, there are new characteristics with Jalaid Mongol.
sentences.chinese: 扎賚特旗蒙古人農耕定居後，物資交易有了新的特點。

sentences.english: The technique of no-tillage cast-transplanted rice is an innovative achievement in Guangxi farming.
sentences.chinese: 水稻免耕拋秧是廣西農耕革命自主創新成果。

sentences.english: Only 17% of all the world's agricultural land is irrigated.
sentences.chinese: 全世界農耕地只有17%得到灌溉。

sentences.english: The feature of farm cultivation is men do farm work and women do housework.
sentences.chinese: 農耕文化一個最顯著的特點是男耕女織。

sentences.english: The pragmatic spirit and idyllic ideal of Chinese literature are derived from the agricultural economics of the Chinese society.
sentences.chinese: 農耕經濟派生了中國文學的務實精神與田園理想。

sentences.english: Of course, there is no going back to the agrarian past.
sentences.chinese: 當然，從信息時代退回到農耕時代是不可能的。

definition: copious/plentiful (of water)/surging (of waves)/refers to home village of first Han emperor 漢高祖|汉高祖[Han4 Gao1 zu3]/fig. majestic
Paiwan, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan
